global connection and symmetric adjacency matrix designs

two major designs.from sentence: The two major designs in our adjacency matrix A , i.e. , global connection and symmetric adjacency matrix designs , are helpful in recognizing emotions .

global connection.from sentence: The global connection models the asymmetric difference between neuronal activities in the left and right hemispheres and have been shown to reveal certain emotions , , .

NodeDAT regularizer.from sentence: Our NodeDAT regularizer has a noticeable positive impact on the performance of our model , which demonstrates that domain adaptation is significantly helpful in crosssubject classification .

DL regularizer.from sentence: DL regularizer improves performance of our model by around 3 % in accuracy on both datasets .

NodeDAT.from sentence: In addition , if NodeDAT is removed , the performance of our model has a greater variance , demonstrating the importance of NodeDAT in improving the robustness of our model against cross - subject variations .
